newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - HNC Software lowered.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - HNC Software lowered.

text.p: -- Smith Barney said it lowered its recommendation on HNC Software Inc to outperform from buy.
-- Shares fell 1-7/8 to 29-1/4 in early Nasdaq trade.
-- Additional details were not immediately available.
